author: World Press Photo Contest 2017
title: World Press Photo Contest 2017 – winning pictures | Media
text:
World Press Photo Contest 2017 – winning pictures Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share via Email View more sharing options Share on LinkedIn Share on Pinterest Share on Google+ Share on WhatsApp Share on Messenger Close 
Highlights from the collection of winning images in the 60th World Press Photo Contest, which were selected from 80,408 images made by 5,034 photographers from 125 different countries 
World Press Photo Contest 2017
Monday 13 February 2017 14.01 GMT 
Spot news – stories, third prize 
Two men struggle in the water during a rescue in the Mediterranean Photograph: Mathieu Willcocks/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
Spot news – singles, third prize 
A car bomb explodes next to Iraqi special forces vehicles as they advance towards Islamic State-held territory in Mosul Photograph: Felipe Dana/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
Spot news – stories, first prize 
Mevlüt Mert Altintaş shouts after shooting Andrei Karlov, the Russian ambassador to Turkey, at an art gallery in Ankara Photograph: Burhan Ozbilici/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
General news – singles, third prize 
A scene inside Quezon City jail, one of the Philippines’ most overcrowded prisons Photograph: Noel Celis/Agence France-Presse
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
General news – stories, first prize 
Police inspect an alley where a victim was killed by two unidentified gunmen in Manila, Philippines Photograph: Daniel Berehulak/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
General news – stories, second prize 
A boy holds the body of his father, killed by Islamic State, as he arrives at a field hospital on the outskirts of Mosul, Iraq Photograph: Sergey Ponomarev/The New York Times
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
Long-term projects – first prize 
Residents escape from a fire at a house destroyed by an air attack in the village of Luhanskaya, Ukraine Photograph: Valery Melnikov/Rossiya Segodnya
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
Long-term projects – second prize 
Women play pool in a male-only venue in Tehran, Iran Photograph: Hossein Fatemi/Panos Pictures
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
Contemporary issues– singles, first prize 
Leshia Evans stands her ground while offering her hands for arrest during a protest against police brutality in Louisiana, US Photograph: Jonathan Bachman/Reuters
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
Sports – singles, first prize 
Nina Carberry flies off her mount, Sir Des Champs, as they fall at the Chair during the Grand National at Aintree in Liverpool Photograph: Tom Jenkins for the Guardian
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
Sports – series, second prize 
A young chess player in the Czech Republic expresses himself during a game Photograph: Michael Hanke/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
Daily life - stories, first prize 
A barber’s shop in Old Havana, Cuba Photograph: Tomás Munita/The New York Times
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
Daily life – singles, third prize 
An Uighur woman carries money in her stockings during a train journey in China Photograph: Matthieu Paley/National Geographic
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
Nature – singles, second prize 
A wild leopard strolls through Sanjay Gandhi national park, a protected area in Mumbai, India Photograph: Nayan Khanolkar/EPA
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
Nature – singles, first prize 
A sea turtle entangled in a fishing net swims off the coast of Tenerife in the Canary Islands Photograph: Francis Perez/EPA
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
Nature – stories, second prize 
A caretaker cradles a panda at the Bifengxia giant panda breeding and research centre in Sichuan, China Photograph: Ami Vitale/National Geographic
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
Nature – singles, third prize 
Monarch butterflies cover the forest floor of the Rosario butterfly sanctuary in Michoacán, Mexico Photograph: Jaime Rojo/EPA
Facebook Twitter Pinterest
